about: Throws knives forward that fan out left or right
Dashes sideways and throws multiple knives a short distance forward at the ground, which then explode
Backsteps and throws multiple knives a short distance in a line forward at the ground, which then explode to deal damage
Jumps up and throws many knives at the ground in a cone pattern, then slams down to deal heavy physical damage, which is immediately followed by the knives detonating
Each golem attack with Fire projectiles
